alert.note: Alert for Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 10 at 3:33AM EDT until April 10 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...Mainland Northern Brevard, Northern Brevard Barrier Islands, Mainland Southern Brevard and Southern Brevard Barrier Islands Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
